data.quote: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
data.author: Buddha (SIDDHARTHA GAUTAMA)

data.quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
data.author: Buddha (SIDDHARTHA GAUTAMA)

data.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
data.author: Buddha (SIDDHARTHA GAUTAMA)

data.quote: If you truly loved yourself, you could never hurt another.
data.author: Buddha (SIDDHARTHA GAUTAMA)

data.quote: If you propose to speak always ask yourself, is it true, is it necessary, is it kind.
data.author: Buddha (SIDDHARTHA GAUTAMA)

data.quote: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise.
data.author: Buddha (SIDDHARTHA GAUTAMA)
